mauro.io

Some Web Fonts I like

1 december 2013

During the search of fonts for this website I came across the following fonts I liked but didn't use:

  • Playfair Display
  • Poiret One sans-serif
  • Domine
  • Cinzel
  • Alike

By the way I chose those:

  • Robot Slab for paragraphs
  • Sanchez for titles
